import { Grid, Icon, Button } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { useRecoilState } from 'recoil' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { selected } from '../data/selected' import { config } from '../data/config' import { displayed } from '../data/displayedParticipants'; export const Preview = () => { const [selectedState, setSelected] = useRecoilState(selected); const [wh, setwh] = useState(1); const [cf,] = useRecoilState(config); const [participantsData] = useRecoilState(displayed); useEffect(() => { // recalculate number of rows/ columns when selections change setwh((Math.ceil(Math.sqrt(selectedState.length)) ? Math.ceil(Math.sqrt(selectedState.length)) : 1)) //let h:number = (Math.ceil(selectedState.length / w) ? Math.ceil(selectedState.length / w) : 1) }, [selectedState]); const removeFromState = (obj) => { //filter out removed item setSelected(selectedState.filter((item) => item.userId !== obj.userId)) } return ( <>
{cf? participantsData.map((sel) => <>
{sel.userName}
) : selectedState.map((sel) => <>
{sel.userName}
)}
) }
